snippet: Friends and those who knew him remembered Junior Seau, whose death was ruled a suicide Thursday, from a teenager to an N.F.L. star to his days after his career ended.
abstract: Friends and acquaintances of Junior Seau, former NFL linebacker who committed suicide, create makeshift memorial outside his home in Oceanside, Calif.

byline.original: By GREG BISHOP and MARY PILON
byline.contributor: Greg Bishop reported from Oceanside, Calif., and Mary Pilon from New York.

lead_paragraph: Friends and those who knew him remembered Junior Seau, whose death was ruled a suicide Thursday, from a teenager to an N.F.L. star to his days after his career ended.

headline.seo: Junior Seau’s Community Recalls a Star Who Never Left
headline.main: A Community Recalls a Star Who Never Left
headline.print_headline: A Community Recalls a Star Who Never Left
